00038 /** 
00039  *  @defgroup ro_leds Onboard Debug LEDs
00040  *  @code #include <leds.h> @endcode
00041  * 
00042  *  @brief Routines for controlling the onboard Debug LEDs
00043  *
00044  * 
00045  * This Routines are for setting, clearing and toggeling the four
00046  * onboard LEDs
00047  *   
00048  *  @note Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006
00049  *  @author Rainer Ostendorf
00050  */
00051 
00052 /**@{*/
00053 
00054 #ifndef LEDS_H_
00055 #define LEDS_H_
00056 
00057 /** turn on the given led 
00058  * @param led number of the led to turn on (0-3)
00059  * @return -1 if led has illegal value, 0 else
00060  */
00061 int set_led( char led );
00062 
00063 /** turn off the given led 
00064  * @param led number of the led to turn off (0-3)
00065  * @return -1 if led has illegal value, 0 else
00066  */
00067 int clear_led( char led );
00068 
00069 
00070 /** toggle the given led 
00071  * @param led number of the led to toggle (0-3)
00072  * @return -1 if led has illegal value, 0 else
00073  */
00074 int toggle_led( char led );
00075 
00076 /** led the leds 1 and 3 fade in and out.
00077  * BEWARE: this functions uses busy waiting and wastes a
00078  * huge amount of cpu-time!
00079  */
00080 void led_pwm_fade( void );
00081 
00082 #endif /*LEDS_H_*/
00083 
00084 /**@}*/
